meanings.definition: To give a pleasant smell to something.
meanings.sent1: I will odorize the room with a fresh air freshener.
meanings.sent2: She likes to odorize her laundry with lavender-scented detergent.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to odorize the kitchen with the aroma of freshly baked cookies.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden odorize the air with their sweet fragrance.
meanings.sent5: The scented candle will odorize the entire living room.

meanings.definition: To add a scent to something.
meanings.sent1: The company will odorize the product to make it more appealing to customers.
meanings.sent2: He used essential oils to odorize the homemade soap.
meanings.sent3: The prankster decided to odorize the room with a strong cheese scent.
meanings.sent4: Her perfume seemed to odorize the entire hallway.
meanings.sent5: The bakery odorizes the street with the smell of freshly baked bread.
